summary: This bill, the Addressing Boarding and Crowding in the Emergency Department Act of 2025 (ABC-ED Act), aims to improve emergency department care. It amends the Public Health Service Act to allow grants for developing systems to track hospital bed capacity and its impact on emergency department operations. It also amends the Social Security Act to pilot programs focused on improving emergency care for older adults and individuals experiencing psychiatric crises. Finally, it mandates a study by the Comptroller General on best practices for tracking hospital capacity data systems.
